name: QA engineer - dbCap
description:
QA engineer position in Moscow dbCap team. Main responsibilities will include: maintaining of the functional and regression test pack, preparing tests cases, analyzing requirements for test environment and test data, test execution including UAT/E2E and bug-fixing testing. The position is for a Quality Assurance specialist. This role will involve cross-team communications, analyzing functional/non-functional requirements, manual functional/regression testing.

Responsibilities:

• Functional requirements analysis

• Creating/updating test cases

• Testing of new functionality and regression testing

• Support and execution of E2E tests in complex test environment; cross-team test coordination

• Report back on testing activities to team managers

• A candidate will interact with wide spread cross-country team

Requirements:

• At least 2 years of relevant experience in QA domain;

• Strong analytical skills, hands-on experience on ad-hoc and exploratory testing

• Understanding of software development life cycle and QA processes

• Experience in different types of testing: System, Integration, Regression, UAT/E2E, Performance

• SQL is a must

• At least basic knowledge of programming languages (Java/Python)

• Confident, articulate, enthusiastic and able to operate independently

• Good written and oral communication skills

• Language skills: English intermediate

• Personal Characteristics: Team player Self-reliance (e.g. work without pushing, etc...)

• Willingness to study new areas

Requirements (Preferred):

• Experience in non-functional testing: Performance, Stress, Load testing, Security, Reliability

• Language skills: English intermediate

Candidate will have good opportunities to gain on-hands experience in QA projects in highly competitive IT environment using many of the innovative technologies
